title: Las Colinas / Some bad/ low credit ok/ repo/ sutdent loans
posting_body: Will consider some bad/low credit okay
closed bankruptcy/ repo/ medical bills/ student loans
MUST have good income and job history

Exterior Amenities: Fitness center, 2 Pools, Business center, Free WiFi Areas, Gated entrance, Assigned parking, Private detached garages($195/mo), Door to door trash pickup, Picnic area, Outdoor Grills, Laundry room, School bus stop, Elevators, Dog Park, Community parking garage

Interior Amenities: W/D connections, W/D machines, Walk-in closets, Garden/large tubs, Private patios/balconies, Attached garages, Cable ready, Hi-speed internet, High ceilings, Custom carpet, Non-carpeted flooring, Custom built-ins, Ice makers, Premium Countertops, Premium Appliances
